title: Ewbank on Life in Brazil - identify context

content.question: Which of the following best describes the context of this source?

choices.label: African Americans formed maroon communities in the Great Dismal Swamp.
More enslaved Africans were taken to Brazil than anywhere else in the Americas.
The Haitian Revolution inspired revolts in other parts of the African diaspora.
During the cotton boom, many enslaved Africans were forcibly relocated.

content.answer: More enslaved Africans were taken to Brazil than anywhere else in the Americas.
